required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Observational Study for Lung Cancer Patients Treated With Nivolumab
clinical_study.official_title: EVIDENS: Lung Cancer Patients TrEated With NiVolumab: A LongItuDinal, ProspEctive, ObservatioNal, Multicentric Study

brief_summary.textblock: This study will describe the characteristics of patients initiating nivolumab treatment for lung cancer and their outcomes over 3 years in France

primary_outcome.measure: Distribution of line of therapy at nivolumab initiation

primary_outcome.description: Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group Performance Status (ECOG PS) A scale used to assess how a patient's disease is progressing, assess how the disease affects the daily living abilities of the patient, and determine appropriate treatment and prognosis

primary_outcome.measure: Distribution of patients working status at nivolumab initiation

primary_outcome.description: Quality of Life (QoL) as assessed by European Quality of Life-5 Dimensions (EQ-5D) EQ-5D: the descriptive system consists of 5 dimensions: mobility, self-care, usual activities,pain/discomfort, and anxiety/depression, each with 3 levels (eg, no problems, moderate problems, extreme problems)

primary_outcome.measure: Median time from initial diagnosis to nivolumab initiation
primary_outcome.description: Median time from initial diagnosis to nivolumab initiation (derived from date of initial diagnosis and date of first dose of nivolumab, assumed to be the date of D0 visit). Any lung cancer declaring more than 5 years after another cancer is defined as an initial diagnosis of lung cancer

primary_outcome.measure: Number of patients exposed to other lung cancer treatments
Distribution of current smokers, former smokers, and non-smokers at initial diagnosis
Distribution of cancer stage at initial diagnosis and at nivolumab initiation
Distribution of Lung cancer histology at initial diagnosis
Number of patients with untreated brain metastasis at nivolumab initiation
Number of patients with treated brain metastasis at nivolumab initiation
Number of patients with PD-L1 expression at nivolumab initiation
Number of patients with mutations at nivolumab initiation
Distribution of concomitant diseases at nivolumab initiation
Number of patients with corticosteroids treatment at nivolumab initiation

primary_outcome.description: Time from index date (treatment with nivolumab) until date of death due to any cause

secondary_outcome.measure: Overall Survival after initiation of nivolumab
Distribution of nivolumab adverse drug reaction

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Up to 3 years after nivolumab initiation
secondary_outcome.description: PFS measured by time since index date (initial treatment with nivolumab) to either the first disease progression date or last known tumor assessment date, or death due to any cause, whichever occurs first as assessed by RECIST 1.1

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Up to 3 years after nivolumab initiation
secondary_outcome.description: ORR is measured by the sum of partial responses plus complete responses as assessed by (RECIST 1.1) Response Evaluation Criteria In Solid Tumors

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline to 3 years after nivolumab initiation

secondary_outcome.measure: Distribution of patient management treatment patterns
Mean weight change in kilogram from baseline
Mean ECOG PS change from baseline
Distribution of patients with new metastasis
Distribution of patients with progression of pre-existing sites

arm_group.description: Lung Cancer patients treated by nivolumab in real life condition in France from October 2016 to October 2017

study_pop.textblock: This study aims to collect data for patients diagnosed with a lung cancer and initiating nivolumab in France

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Male or female: 18 age at the time of nivolumab initiation
- Pathologically confirmed diagnosis of lung cancer
- Patient initiating nivolumab :therapeutic decision to initiate nivolumab must be taken by the physician prior to enrolling a patient in the study
Exclusion Criteria:
-Patient taking part in an interventional study for lung cancer treatment for which nivolumab is 1 of the investigational drugs
Other protocol defined inclusion or exclusion criteria could apply
